snippet: The State Board of Health, remade by Gov. Terry McAuliffe, a Democrat who took office in January, voted Thursday to amend rules that threatened to close abortion clinics.
abstract: Virginia State Board of Health votes to role back abortion clinic restrictions.
lead_paragraph: The State Board of Health, remade by Gov. Terry McAuliffe, a Democrat who took office in January, voted Thursday to amend rules that threatened to close abortion clinics.

headline.main: Virginia: Abortion Clinic Restrictions Are Rolled Back
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Abortion Clinic Restrictions Are Rolled Back
